attributes.action: Spend the money on saving bees rather than making fake ones
attributes.additional_details:
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pesticide_toxicity_to_bees - UK have agreed to ban pesticides which harm Bees but I want to bring to awareness how much they’re effecting bees and for the banning of pesticides to proceed. 
https://www.scienceabc.com/nature/bee-extinction-means-end-humanity.html - information on the importance of bees
attributes.background:
How much would be spent on saving our planet and ourselves?
How about we buy large bits of land around the country, plant flowers, decrease pesticides, ban honey company’s that exploit bees, plant colonies, let them get on with it and leave them be!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Spend the money on saving bees rather than making fake ones".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
